title: What are all the social networks focused on sharing apps? - Quora

response.answer_text: We're launching our Mevvy app this week! Our goal is for our users to follow the people they trust and see what apps they use, install, rate and recommend. We're not trying to make this an actual social network, but a place to find simple down-to-the-point information: what apps do people use. As we are a small startup currently working out of Cancun, Mexico and we are ambitious to get our app out there, we're working on a pretty cool guerrilla marketing campaign to launch the app. If you are interested in the topic you are welcome to follow our campaign via social media #OperationKingKong ...  Launch is planned for August 10. :)
There's Best Android Apps and Games on Google Play | Playboard too -- we're all about Android and curated app channels.
